value:
The protection of this realm hinges
on you. I know that role too well.
Here, I will protect you.

I love seeing places like this. I think
it's because I was kept in a remote
fortress when growing up.

It's nice to see you always looking
after everyone. I once had that duty.
Let me know if I can ever help.

Heard of Dragon Veins? Where I'm
from, I can tap their power to change
the terrain. Are there any here?

I was thinking of my many siblings.
They're all precious in their own ways.
Family can be such a treasure.

I've come with greetings from
$Nf. What a lovely
castle you have here!

I've become so strong thanks to
everyone's help.

Good. I'll be able to help more
folks now.
It seems I didn't get much stronger...
Let's see what I can do now!

I'm Corrin—born in Hoshido, though
raised in Nohr. I will fight for you with
my Yato blade and dragon power!

Ah, $Nu!
Thanks for coming to visit me
again!$k$pOh, sorry I keep patting you on
the head—it's a bad habit I picked
up back home.$k$pBut I do think that touch can bring
friends closer than words can,
you know? Wanna try it?$k$pHeehee—you're so gentle! It's
been a while since someone
patted ME on the head. It's nice!$k$pAnytime you want to pat or be
patted, let me know! It can only
help us be stronger together.
はっ！
せやっ！
きゃあっ
That's not good...
We won't give up!
I've made my choice!
I won't surrender!
My path is certain!
This can't be...
Heehee
The small things really count with friends—even a little smile can make a big difference.
I have so many siblings. I couldn't be more fortunate!
I admire the course you've taken here—to fight with everyone's help!
I wonder if there are any Dragon Veins here. Where I'm from, they're everywhere!
You and I are like two peas in a pod. We'll get along very well.
My sacred blade contains the love of everyone I've fought for...even of those I've fought with.
You can lean on me if you're weary. I feel as if you're family. And I, your sister.
OK!
All right.
Here I go!
